Html:
Very nice library. Thank you for your hard work.

I note that the repository doesn't store a set of import libraries - and when I tried to build against the tip of TimeSpan2 I got numerous errors. Are there any plans to identify the proper dependencies to use when building, or perhaps to store those dependencies in the repo?

You can find all the missing assemblies in the TaskSchedulerEditor.zip file in the downloads section. I like the idea of adding them to the source code repository and will look at how I might do that so pulling the code also pulls the dependencies.
That's what I ended up using. One thing is that the solution/projects are referencing projects, not binary dependencies.
